quotes.quote: Paint the essential character of things.
Life is a great big canvas; throw all the paint you can at it.
A great artist can paint a great picture on a small canvas.
If you hear a voice within you say you cannot paint, then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
Paint as you see and be accurate in your drawing: the whole secret of your art is there.
All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind.
Painting is silent poetry, and poetry is painting that speaks.
Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
To live is to paint, it is to create; but while we are painting, we are being painted, being created as well!
Paint from the inside out.
A painter paints his pictures on canvas. But musicians paint their pictures on silence. We provide the music, and you provide the silence.
If you paint in your mind a picture of bright and happy expectations, you put yourself into a condition conducive to your goal.
Painting is another form of thinking.
An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
Paint what you are, paint what you believe, paint what you feel.
Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
Your painting is a measure of your mind.
Paint what you see, not what you know.
Painting is not about what you see, its about what you don't see.
Painting is like child birth you forget how hard it is until you do it again.
